title: Good
content:
Here are the refined reviews:

Primebook looks good. The battery is awesome. However, it's only suitable for students, as we can open 5-6 tabs simultaneously. I purchased it for trading in the stock market, but I'm very disappointed - it's not ideal for this purpose due to the charts hiding automatically again and again. It's not well-suited for complex tasks like trading, but it may be sufficient for students and simple types of work.
